message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $82. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $78. Would you be willing to go a bit lower?
I'm still not willing to go that low, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I think $85 is the lowest I can go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit higher than my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $80?
